availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John M. Hewitt (Franklin County, Kentucky lawyer and politician)

body.p: Franklin County, Kentucky lawyer and politician. Virginia native. Married Mildred Holloway Hewitt on November 13, 1832. Father of Martha F Hewitt, Betty B Hewitt, Thomas Hewitt, George Ann Hewitt, John M Hewitt, Yeba Hewitt. Employed as a lawyer in Franklin County in 1850. Served in the Kentucky House of Representatives from 1855 to 1857. Employed as a lawyer in Frankfort, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Woodford County Marriages, Film #252320, p.57
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 54B
Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, Collins' Historical Sketches of Kentucky, vol. 2, p. 241 (Covington, KY: Collins & Co., 1874)
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 258
